EmailTemplate.name: HH Signup Form Response
EmailTemplate.subject: We have received your request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there {!Lead.FirstName}! We have received your request to secure a spot on Live Different Build. Please continue with the registration process as outlined on the trip details page.
Once they are filled out, mail them with your $300 initial fundraising deposit to the address from the trip details page.
If you have any specific questions, please search our FAQ section. If you are unable to find an answer on our site, please feel free to contact us at hh@livedifferent.com
Thanks,
Charles Roberts Director of Programs Absolute 905 777 1662 (866) 432 4464
